      • partitionBlocks

        public static Map<Boolean,List<Block>> partitionBlocks(Survey survey)
        Partitions the top-level blocks in the survey into those that are floating and those that are static. Values at key Boolean.TRUE are floating; values are Boolean.FALSE are static.
        Parameters:
        survey - The survey whose top-level blocks we want to partition.
        Returns:
        The partition.
